item.description:
Whether you are a veteran New Englander or new to this region, apple picking is a must-do fall activity. Join us as we pick apples at Barden Family Orchard in North Scituate, about 20 min from Providence.

The apples that are available this weekend are Macintosh, Gala, Cortland, Liberty, Jonagold and Macoun. Learn more about apple varieties at http://www.bardenfami...

There will also be raspberries, peaches, pumpkins, and cherry tomatoes available for picking.

We will meet at the storefront at 1pm. I will email my phone number to YES and MAYBE rsvps the day before the event.
item.name: Apple Picking at Barden Family Orchard
